00037 #ifndef __MEM_REFCOUNTED_H__
00038 #define __MEM_REFCOUNTED_H__
00039 
00052 class MEM_RefCounted {
00053 public:
00057     MEM_RefCounted() : m_refCount(1)
00058     {
00059     }
00060 
00065     inline virtual int getRef() const;
00066 
00071     inline virtual int incRef();
00072 
00078     inline virtual int decRef();
00079 
00080 protected:
00085     virtual ~MEM_RefCounted()
00086     {
00087     }
00088 
00089 protected:
00091     int m_refCount;
00092 };
00093 
00094 
00095 inline int MEM_RefCounted::getRef() const
00096 {
00097     return m_refCount;
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline int MEM_RefCounted::incRef()
00101 {
00102     return ++m_refCount;
00103 }
00104 
00105 inline int MEM_RefCounted::decRef()
00106 {
00107     m_refCount--;
00108     if (m_refCount == 0) {
00109         delete this;
00110         return 0;
00111     }
00112     return m_refCount;
00113 }
